name: MOPAC: London Crime Prevention Fund
author: Test

blocksEnabled.annualBudgetHelpText: Enter the amount of capital and/or revenue you are requesting for the year and the amount of funding being provided from other sources.

blocksEnabled.infoMessage: Title must be unique to project or activity. Avoid using 'LCPF' or similar.

MOPAC has relationships with VCS organisations across London. This information is being requested in order to get a London-wide picture of VCS funding and to guard against double funding with any of MOPAC's pan-London contracts.
